sourcesContent:
Create your portfolio

Experience

  • {{experience?.title}}
  • {{experience.place}}
  • {{experience.startDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}----{{experience.endDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}
  • {{experience.description}}

Education

  • {{education?.title}}
  • {{education.startDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}----{{education.endDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}
  • {{education.university}}
  • {{education.departement}}
  • {{education.mention}}

Skills

  • {{skill?.name}}
  • {{skill?.level}}

Projects

  • {{project?.title}}
  • {{project?.description}}
  • {{project?.date}}
  • {{project?.link}}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { FormPortService } from '../form-port.service'; import { Formulaire } from '../models/formulaire'; import { Experience } from '../models/experince'; import { Education } from '../models/education'; import { Skill } from '../models/skill'; import { Project } from '../models/project'; @Component({ selector: 'app-formulaire', templateUrl: './formulaire.component.html', styleUrls: ['./formulaire.component.css'] }) export class FormulaireComponent { @Input () personne: Formulaire[] = []; experiences: Experience[] = []; educations: Education[] = []; skills: Skill[] = []; projects: Project[] = []; constructor( private formPort: FormPortService) { } onSubmit(form: any) { console.log(form.vaue) form.value.experience = this.experiences; form.value.education = this.educations; form.value.skills = this.skills; form.value.projects = this.projects; this.formPort.addFormulaire(form.value); form.reset(); } experienceForm: Experience = { title: '', place: '', startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), description: '' }; educationForm: any = { title: '', startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), university: '', departement: '', description: '', mention: '' }; skillForm: any = { title: '', description: '' }; projectForm: any = { title: '', description: '', link: '' }; addExperience() { this.experiences.push(this.experienceForm); this.experienceForm = { title: '', place: '', startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), description: '' }; } addEducation() { this.educations.push(this.educationForm); this.educationForm = { title: '', startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), university: '', departement: '', description: '', mention: '' }; } addSkill() { this.skills.push(this.skillForm); this.skillForm = { title: '', description: '' }; } addProject() { this.projects.push(this.projectForm); this.projectForm = { title: '', description: '', link: '' }; } deleteExperience(index: number) { this.experiences.splice(index, 1); } deleteEducation(index: number) { this.educations.splice(index, 1); } deleteSkill(index: number) { this.skills.splice(index, 1); } deleteProject(index: number) { this.projects.splice(index, 1); } }
